complete.check_status_comment: You can check the status right now by clicking the following TX hash or save your TX hash and check the status later.
complete.tx_broadcast_network: After 12 ETH network confimations and 2/3 witnesses' confirmations, the XRC20 tokens will be minted and sent to your IoTeX wallet:
complete.tx_broadcast_network.xrc20: After 1 IoTeX network confirmation and 2/3 witnesses' confirmations, your XRC20 token will be burnt and ${tokenName} will be sent to your ETH wallet:
contract.install: Please use ioPay desktop, import & unlock your wallet, and then refresh this page to continue.
beta_notice: THIS PRODUCT IS IN BETA. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
